compliance.headline: Source Protection & Security

certifications.description: Source materials never train our AI

compliance.confidentiality: We understand source confidentiality. All documents are encrypted and private. We never share your research or use it for AI training.

faq.question: Are my sources and research protected?
faq.answer: Absolutely! All documents are encrypted and stored securely. We never share your data or use it for AI training. Perfect for protecting confidential sources and investigative work.

faq.question: Can it handle government and legal documents?
faq.answer: Yes! Our AI is trained on government reports, court filings, regulatory documents, and legal language. Perfect for FOIA responses and investigative reporting.

faq.question: How does it help with fact-checking?
faq.answer: Quickly summarize source documents and research studies to verify facts and claims. Cross-reference multiple sources in a fraction of the time.

faq.question: What's included in the free plan?
faq.answer: Free plan includes 100 pages/month - perfect for freelance journalists. Full-time reporters typically need the Starter ($9/mo) or Pro plan ($19/mo) for heavy research.

faq.question: Can newsrooms get team pricing?
faq.answer: Yes! The Team plan ($49/mo) allows unlimited journalists to collaborate and share research. Enterprise newsrooms get custom pricing with advanced features. Contact sales.

faq.question: Can I export summaries for my stories?
faq.answer: Yes! Export as PDF, Word, or plain text. Use summaries as research notes or include verified quotes and statistics in your articles.
